value.title: Power BI Walkthrough: Analysis Services Live Connect
value.excerpt: Adam walks through how to setup a live connection to Analysis Services, or Azure Analysis Services, in Power BI Desktop. This also involves getting things working with the On-Premises Data Gateway.  What is a gateway - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WJ5Y4FjkWZw Authentication with AS Live Connections

value.title: How to Do Power BI Mapping With Latitude and Longitude Only
value.excerpt: You can just use latitude and longitude to visualize data on the map. In this video, you will learn how you can do that with the map visual in Power BI. Read more and download the dataset from my blog article link here: https://radacad.com/how-to-do-power-bi-mapping-with-latitude-and-longitude-only

value.title: CreateÂ paginated reportsÂ Â
value.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Create a data-driven story with Power BI reports
value.excerpt: Power BI helps you create vibrant, highly useful reports that form a cohesive, data-driven story. Youâ€™ll learn how to use buttons, bookmarks, and other navigation techniques. Additionally, youâ€™ll learn how to integrate Power BI reports with other applications. Power BI visuals can interact with each other, letting the user see exactly which data is appealing to them. Youâ€™ll also explore Power BI report themes to create a unified reporting experience across all reports.

value.title: Publish and share in Power BI
value.excerpt: Publish and share your Power BI reports and dashboards to teammates in your organization or to everyone on the web.

value.title: Sales Prediction Model with Python and Power BI

value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)
